line_1: To that same castle our advent'rer yode,
line_2: An hundred flow'rs aumail'd the winding road,

line_1: And much they moraliz'd as thus yfere they yode.
line_2: Meantime, the Bard on milk-white Palfrey rode;

line_1: And much they moraliz'd as thus yfere they yode.
line_2: His Meditations, but full softly trode:
